definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: China has begun to make the civil code.
sentences.chinese: 中國已經開始着手製定民法典。

sentences.english: Systemization is the inherent requirement of the Civil Code.
sentences.chinese: 體系化與系統化是民法典的內在要求。

sentences.english: The writer attempts to dip into the value proneness of French civil code from the perspective of legal culture.
sentences.chinese: 本文擬就從法律文化角度淺析法國民法典的價值取向。

sentences.english: The second chapter puts emphasis on warranty of defects of GBT.
sentences.chinese: 第二章介紹了德國民法典對瑕疵擔保制度的修改。

sentences.english: These were only a few issues from many others -at least, as many issues as a Civil Code has.
sentences.chinese: 這些僅僅只是一部民法典所涉及的衆多問題中的一些。

sentences.english: So we should establish the system of priority in our future Civil Code.
sentences.chinese: 因此我國未來民法典中應當建立完整的優先權制度。

sentences.english: China's Civil Code should initialize the proof responsibility in design of unjust enrichment system.
sentences.chinese: 我國民法典設計不當得利制度時，應該預置證明責任。

sentences.english: The formulation of civil code is fundamental to the development of Chinese legal system .
sentences.chinese: 民法典的制定是中國法制進程中的奠基性事業。

sentences.english: China's Civil Code of the draft has made the acquisitive prescription system.
sentences.chinese: 我國的民法典草案中已經規定了取得時效制度。

sentences.english: Our country's civil code should construct the self-help behavior system.
sentences.chinese: 我國民法典應當建立自助行爲制度。

sentences.english: In our country, has not promulgated the Civil Code, let alone the Commercial Code.
sentences.chinese: 在我國，至今沒有頒佈民法典，更談不上商法典。

definition: system of constitutional government/(used as an attributive) constitutional
to rule according to the law
